title: Data Analyst Job Insights
text:
Takeaways

If training to be a Data Analyst, make sure you are proficient in at least:

SQL
Tableau or Power BI
Python (or R for some specific fields or skills)
One cloud platform, especially AWS

Be on lookout for positions with the following cliches on the job description:

‚Äúability to work under pressure‚Äù
‚Äúmultitasking‚Äù
‚Äúfast-paced environment‚Äù


Those are probably workplaces that will challenge your mental health and you won‚Äôt even earn enough for it to be worth it.

European companies, please start disclosing salaries for your positions, thank you in advance!



@rafabelokurows - Github repository - Medium article

title: Data Analyst Job Insights
text:
Takeaways

If training to be a Data Analyst, make sure you are proficient in at least:

SQL
Tableau or Power BI
Python (or R for some specific fields or skills)
One cloud platform, especially AWS

Be on lookout for positions with the following cliches on the job description. Those are probably workplaces that will challenge your mental health and you won‚Äôt even earn enough for it to be worth it:

‚Äúability to work under pressure‚Äù

‚Äúfast-paced environment‚Äù

European companies, please start disclosing salaries for your positions, thank you in advance!
